verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your lovingkindness simply amazes me,
Simply amazes me.
Your lovingkindness simply amazes me,
Simply amazes me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When I look at heaven and the work of Your hands
How is it Father that You are mindful of man?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I look at Jesus and the marks in His hands
How is it Father that You are mindful of man?
